attributes.action: Make it mandatory that social media platforms need ID’s to create accounts
attributes.additional_details: Due to the aftermath of the English Footballers being disgustingly treated with racism by trolls, a change is needed. Whether it is the trolls who are prosecuted or the social media platforms, racism, hate, bullying etc needs to stop NOW! A legislation in parliament needs to be passed that states, social media platforms, need to make it mandatory that users have to provide a passport ID or national security numbers in order to create profiles, this will then help bring justice to all victims.
attributes.background: Create a legislation that states, social media platforms should ask users to provide a passport number, national security number or driving license ID in order to set up profiles to use accounts.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Make verified ID a requirement for opening a social media account.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575833

Make it compulsory to submit ID on social media to help end online abuse.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572480

Produce and enforce a zero-tolerance strategy to end racism on social media
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591720
